metadata.title: FA Analyze 23 02

config.question: Which of the following areas involved installing officials at the state level rather than at the municipal level?

choices.content: physicians and nurses to improve health
engineers to oversee utility and water systems
city planners to manage park and highway development

answer_2.response: Consider This: Reformers soon discovered that many problems lay beyond a city’s boundaries, and they turned to the state governments. Reformers created a number of regulatory commissions and municipal departments during the Progressive Era. See L.O. 23.2 Reform in the Cities and States.

answer_1.response: Consider This: Reformers soon discovered that many problems lay beyond a city’s boundaries, and they turned to the state governments. Reformers created a number of regulatory commissions and municipal departments during the Progressive Era. See L.O. 23.2 Reform in the Cities and States.
